name: Tea 'N' Scones
description:
Tea 'N' Scones is a 2-4 player competitive game where you defeat opposition by jumping on your oppositions heads. Deathmatch and Survival modes have been implemented. All Feedback/Bug reports are welcome. 

Animation has been pushed back and will be adding a second Power Up for Beta Release.

The game is heavily inspired from the 1998 game Jump N Bump.

**Alpha release of a prototype game for part of my Game Design Course.  This is created after 2 weeks of learning programming.**

Play with others not local using parsec gaming
